description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, providing basic endpoints for the finetunellama3backend application, including a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing endpoints for welcoming, documentation redirection, health status, and application information.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message to indicate the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Builds and redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple string indicating the health status of the application.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
